data.title: Used Lumber Rack
data.meta-description: Used Lumber Rack For Sale at American Surplus, In Stock, Nationwide shipping, perfect for storing lumber, plywood, and much more

ul.li: Also known as used cantilever rack

long-description.p: Used Lumber Rack, also known as cantilever rack is in stock at American Surplus. We have a variety of sizes to offer and each has a different capacity. Our used lumber rack is I-beam material and has a wide range of uses. If you are not sure what style lumber rack is right for you just call and speak with a member of our sales team. Our sizes that we have in stock are below. Used cantilever rack is affordable and ships nationwide. Organize your lumber, plywood, and other wood products with ease.

p.strong: We can’t list our entire inventory online, if you do not see what you are looking for, just ask! Quantity discounts available on used lumber rack 40-60% off the price of new. Call 800-876-3736 for additional information & a free quote. American Surplus will provide a quote on new equipment if used is unavailable. Nationwide shipping is available. Price and product availability subject to change without notice. Inventory is subject to prior sale.
